subject: Golf
Basketball
lead_paragraph: With 17 years’ experience working for the PGA Tour, Donna Orender, the president of the W.N.B.A., might be considered a top choice as the commissioner of the L.P.G.A.
snippet: With 17 years’ experience working for the PGA Tour, Donna Orender, the president of the W.N.B.A., might be considered a top choice as the commissioner of the L.P.G.A.
